title: Chat UI example prompt for positive/thank-you phrases

requirements.summary: Add a positive/thank-you phrase to the welcome-state example prompt buttons so users can easily try the new recognition behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The welcome-state example prompt buttons include a new prompt that uses a positive/thank-you phrase.
Clicking the new example prompt button fills the input field with that phrase, consistent with existing example prompt behavior.

file_operations.description: Update the `examplePrompts` list to include at least one new positive/thank-you example (e.g., "Thanks" or "Great job") so it renders as an additional welcome-state prompt button. Ensure it continues to use the existing click handler that fills the input. Uses existing shadcn-ui Button rendering already present in this file; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
